name: James and The Dungeon Conundrum
description:
"starring James!"

JTDC is a game where our titular friend James must go through a dungeon, filled with monsters, and lots o’ loot! But the more loot he collects, the more he realizes he can only carry so much.

You must get rid of heavy loot, else face your greed!

Made for Ludum Dare 43, “Sacrifices must be made”

(This game is pretty "unplayable", but you may like how it went! Just wanted to get on a jam like this, and have some fun. Also thanks to my friend Nerdy San for the wall sprites, pretty neato!)
